description: This data set contains electricity, natural gas, and heating oil usage for all City buildings above 25,000 square feet. This data set is exclusive to the April 5/7 Clean Web Challenge.

metadata.attribution: City of Boston: Greenovate Boston and Department of Energy and Environmental Services

name: Municipal Energy Data
